## SPIGpio type

SPI0-MOSI is available on GPIOs 10 and 38. Only GPIO 10 is available on all models. See [https://github.com/jgarff/rpi\_ws281x?tab=readme-ov-file\#spi](https://github.com/jgarff/rpi_ws281x?tab=readme-ov-file#spi)

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type SPIGpio = 10 | 38;
```
